name: Caffeination
description:
CAFFEINATION [WORK IN PROGRESS]

Open and manage your own coffee shop in this game! Combine ingredients and create the perfect coffee for your customers. But do it wisely; combine everything recklessly and you might make your customer intoxicated, or pick the ingredients too carefully and you will be having a lot of wasted ingredients. Will you make your ingredients a harmful resource for your customer, or your environment?

  • You get a deck of ingredient cards that can be combined to create one coffee recipe. You can only combine 3 - 5 cards for one coffee.
  • The customer will pay you based on the beverages they get.
  • You will get income from customers; but wasted ingredients will cut your income in the end of the day.

DEV NOTES:

This game is not fully completed, there are many features that I haven't be able to add before the game jam deadline. Features that are still in progress:

  • A deck of action cards to swap or increase the score of the ingredient cards.
  • Random conditions that the customers will have; you should not create a coffee that contradict the conditions.
  • Polishing of UI and music.

Stay connected to see the added feature and the completed game! :)
